ratings.comment: A very quick email responder and easy on the grades. The learning topics were super interesting! Class layout and expectations are very clear from the start and she is super accommodating. Grades are posted promptly. Overall, I would 100% recommend this class!

Took this class thinking it would be a fun, easygoing online class to distract from other course work & was sadly mistaken. Ended up doing more work for this class than ones that counted towards my major. Crazy writing assignments every other week and some of them asked for things we never explicitly talk about. Would not recommend this class.

Should be called philosophy of geography. By the end of the semester the reports I was writing became so obscure. Rubrics were not very helpful. 7 grueling papers with never ending readings. She frequently offered extensions & a few opportunities for EC. 2 other professors help with grading, Elsa never graded any of my work.
